audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by Industry or Sector :: Education

name: Learning Team C Week 4 Assignment
short_description:
Use a synchronous tool to The advantages and disadvantages of each type of learning 
Differences in facilitation strategies
Differences between the facilitators and the learners in each type of learning  
Second, we'll need to summarize our choice of Moodle.org by explaining: 
Why this mode of delivery was selected 
Why our choice is appropriate for the subject matter
 How this mode of delivery could be applied to our teaching environment
 An explanation of how the same topic might be presented using a synchronous medium
